msg: 1. modified the ADBBeanTemplate.xsl so that it parses the minOccurs=0 and resursive datatypes properly. Thanks chuck for the patches and support
2. Added a new test case to check the use of choice and sequence together
3. Modified the tests to suit the situation since in the minoccurs case the array output is null - not en empty array
